backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing three high-confidence features related to dead-zone clamping in movementDetection.ts, elimination guard in gameState.ts, and score consumption in useGameState.ts, each mapped to test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend modules, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color tokens for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Squid Game app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the 3D scene, webcam overlay, HUD elements, and full-screen modal screens (idle, eliminated, won) based on the current game phase from useGameState.
frontend/src/components/CountdownDisplay: Displays an animated 3-2-1 countdown with a pop-in keyframe animation and instructional text before the game starts.
frontend/src/components/EliminatedScreen: Full-screen elimination result overlay showing final progress percentage, a progress bar, survival time, and a Try Again button.
frontend/src/components/FollowCamera.tsx: React Three Fiber component that smoothly lerps the camera position and look-at target to follow the player's Z position each frame.
frontend/src/components/GameCanvas.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/IdleScreen.tsx: Welcome screen displaying the game title, how-to-play instructions, and a Start Game button to initiate gameplay.
frontend/src/components/Player.tsx: 3D player character built from Three.js primitives (cylinder, spheres, legs) that smoothly interpolates toward a Z position derived from progress, with phase-based color changes for normal, eliminated, and won states.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Horizontal progress bar component with phase-aware fill color and glow, a shine overlay, and milestone markers at 25%, 50%, and 75%.
frontend/src/components/SensitivitySlide: A range slider component for adjusting game sensitivity, displaying labeled levels (FORGIVING/NORMAL/STRICT/BRUTAL) with corresponding colors based on the current value.
frontend/src/components/StatusText.tsx: Displays an animated 'GREEN LIGHT' or 'RED LIGHT' text with matching neon colors during those game phases, rendering nothing otherwise.
frontend/src/components/ThreeScene.tsx: A React Three Fiber 3D scene component rendering a ground plane, finish line, doll figure, stars, and dynamic lighting that changes color based on the current game phase.
frontend/src/components/Timer.tsx: Formats and displays an elapsed time in milliseconds as a MM:SS.t or SS.ts string using a monospace display font.
frontend/src/components/WebcamOverlay.ts: A fixed-position overlay that activates the webcam, runs pose tracking, renders a mirrored video feed with skeleton overlay on a canvas, and reports movement scores to the parent component.
frontend/src/components/WonScreen.tsx: Displays a win screen with the final time, a full progress bar, and a 'PLAY AGAIN' button when the player completes the game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both authenticated (Internet Identity) and anonymous actors, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: A React hook managing the full game state machine (idle, countdown, green-light, red-light, eliminated, won), handling phase transitions, progress updates, timers, and audio effects based on movement score and sensitivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components via a React context provider.
File is empty with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/usePoseTracking.ts: React hook that initializes MediaPipe Pose, runs a requestAnimationFrame loop to process webcam frames, buffers landmarks, and returns a movement score, current landmarks, readiness state, and any error.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Bebas Neue and Share Tech Mono fonts, defines Tailwind base/components/utilities, sets dark game-themed CSS custom properties, and adds utility classes for glow effects and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/modules/gameState.ts: Defines the game state machine types and pure functions for determining phase transitions, progress advancement, and elimination based on movement score and sensitivity, including a dead-zone guard.
frontend/src/modules/movementDetection.t: Provides functions to compute a smoothed movement score from a buffer of MediaPipe landmark frames using core body points, and utilities to map sensitivity to thresholds, apply a dead zone clamp, and check if movement exceeds a threshold.
frontend/src/modules/poseTracking.ts: Loads MediaPipe Pose via CDN script injection, initializes a Pose instance with configurable options, and exposes helpers to send video frames for processing and draw the skeleton on a canvas.
frontend/src/modules/scene.ts: Exports 3D scene layout constants (track length, camera offsets, colors, etc.) and a helper to convert game progress (0â€“100) to a Z-axis position.
frontend/src/utils/audioEffects.ts: Provides procedural Web Audio API sound effects for game events: green light, red light, elimination, victory, and countdown beep.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom game colors (pink, red, green, gold), display/mono fonts, glow box shadows, and countdown/fade-in animations. Enables dark mode via class and includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 11) describing a Squid Game Red Light/Green Light browser game built with React Three Fiber for 3D rendering and MediaPipe Pose for webcam-based movement detection, including known issues around webcam overlay rendering and dead-zone reliability.
